at_least_one_image: At least one Image has to be selected!
you_have_selected: You have selected but not added files to the image list. Push or cancel please to finish!
price_greater_zero: Price has to be greater or equal 0
only_images: Only images are allowed to be added
duplicate_found: Duplicate found that will not be added
drag_and_drop: Drag and drop file(s) here, or click to select file
confirm_text: Are you sure you want to remove this product?
order_image_text: Set the order for the Slider by dragging the images. The first image in order will be the main one.
confirm_change_category: As a result of changing the category, attribute values will be lost. Change category?
info_edit_rule: The document cannot be edited without changing it to Draft status. This may have happened as a result of a status change in another browser window, but this is not a problem.
